ygData.subject: Unexpected benefit from PoA?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the benefit would be for the players who either don t have the time to camp the spawn points that drop good items or would rather just outright purchase
ygData.messageBody:
Well the "benefit" would be for the players who either don't have the time
to camp the spawn points that drop good items or would rather just outright
purchase the good items. I will admit that the people who try to camp those
sites and get the item for themself are likely to get frustrated. If this
situation occurs, then the lower level charatcers could possibly use the
/yield rule (assuming it ever got implemented).

Galtin of E'ci

Heh benefit? Notice the one line go back to low level areas and camp
items
> for cash. The problem here is that were camping low levle areas how many
> people are gonna be bitching now?
>
>
>
>
